Game.Items

Class Deck

  • java.lang.Object
    • Game.Items.Deck
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DeckInterface
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    UnoDeck

    public class Deck
extends java.lang.Object
implements DeckInterface
    Deck implements the DeckInterface and handles the basics of the deck.
